titleStmt.title: Denbigh-Castle surprized for the King by 60 Cavalliers that scaled the walls, who were all after taken prisoners, and the Castle secured. With a list of the chiefe officers. Also the last fight at Colchester, brought in a letter last night, the chief gunner slain and others, and divers prisoners taken. And the Lord Gorings proclamation published in Colchester on Friday last.
titleStmt.author: Norwich, George Goring, Earl of, 1583?-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the generall satisfaction of moderate men,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the generall satisfaction of moderate men
